/usr/bin/c++ CMakeFiles/build_log_perftest.dir/src/build_log_perftest.cc.o CMakeFiles/libninja.dir/src/build_log.cc.o CMakeFiles/libninja.dir/src/build.cc.o CMakeFiles/libninja.dir/src/clean.cc.o CMakeFiles/libninja.dir/src/clparser.cc.o CMakeFiles/libninja.dir/src/dyndep.cc.o CMakeFiles/libninja.dir/src/dyndep_parser.cc.o CMakeFiles/libninja.dir/src/debug_flags.cc.o CMakeFiles/libninja.dir/src/deps_log.cc.o CMakeFiles/libninja.dir/src/disk_interface.cc.o CMakeFiles/libninja.dir/src/edit_distance.cc.o CMakeFiles/libninja.dir/src/eval_env.cc.o CMakeFiles/libninja.dir/src/graph.cc.o CMakeFiles/libninja.dir/src/graphviz.cc.o CMakeFiles/libninja.dir/src/json.cc.o CMakeFiles/libninja.dir/src/line_printer.cc.o CMakeFiles/libninja.dir/src/manifest_parser.cc.o CMakeFiles/libninja.dir/src/metrics.cc.o CMakeFiles/libninja.dir/src/missing_deps.cc.o CMakeFiles/libninja.dir/src/parser.cc.o CMakeFiles/libninja.dir/src/state.cc.o CMakeFiles/libninja.dir/src/status.cc.o CMakeFiles/libninja.dir/src/string_piece_util.cc.o CMakeFiles/libninja.dir/src/util.cc.o CMakeFiles/libninja.dir/src/version.cc.o CMakeFiles/libninja.dir/src/subprocess-posix.cc.o CMakeFiles/libninja-re2c.dir/src/depfile_parser.cc.o CMakeFiles/libninja-re2c.dir/src/lexer.cc.o -o build_log_perftest
